subject: Discrimination
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Gregory S. Jackson, who was promoted in April to be the chief of staff to the Rutgers president amid a coaching abuse scandal, was already facing his own legal problems.
snippet: Gregory S. Jackson, who was promoted in April to be the chief of staff to the Rutgers president amid a coaching abuse scandal, was already facing his own legal problems.
